showScoreExcerpt: "This being a drama firmly grounded in the hallowed miserable-American-family tradition, by the conclusion all the secrets have tumbled out, and the ugly bones of long-held resentments have been picked over. And over, and over—the play runs nearly three hours."

keyPhrases.quote: And over, and over—the play runs nearly three hours
the ugly bones of long-held resentments have been picked over
the play runs nearly three hours
